def_cn: 顶级的；最高水平的；十分成功的
def_en: You can use big time to refer to the highest level of an activity or sport where you can achieve the greatest amount of success or importance. If you describe a person as big time, you mean they are successful and important.
If someone hits the big time, they become famous or successful in a particular area of activity.

def_cn: （强调重要性或程度深）极大地
def_en: You can use big time if you want to emphasize the importance or extent of something that has happened.
